title: Fullstack Developer
description: Developed a fullstack application for a client using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. The application is a platform for users to create and share their own recipes. The application also includes a feature for users to search for recipes based on ingredients they have on hand.

title: Fullstack Developer
description: Development and maintenance of web applications using Angular and TypeScript. Collaboration with the team to understand and meet project requirements. Implementation of agile methodologies to optimize the development process.

title: Fullstack Developer
description: Co-founder of a software factory, in charge of end-to-end system development (Frontend and Backend). In close collaboration with clients, I offer customized and personalized solutions.
